title: Chic Boutique Getaway in the Heart of New Plymouth
description: Treat yourself to a luxe getaway at the stylish King & Queen Hotel Suites, boasting elegant European and Moroccan-influenced décor and an enviable location in the heart of New Plymouth. Soak up the freshest of ocean breezes as you stroll along the beaches of New Zealand's stunning west coast or connect with nature on a hike through Taranaki’s stunning national park. Enjoy a NZ$80 Food & Beverage credit and a guaranteed 2pm late checkout.
offer_address: 41 Queen Street New Plymouth, Taranaki 4312 New Zealand

title: Boutique European-Style New Plymouth Luxury Suites with Daily Breakfast Credit
description:
Escape to New Zealand’s stunning Taranaki region with a luxurious stay at King & Queen Hotel Suites, perfectly located in the centre of New Plymouth's arts and cultural hub.

Relax and unwind in style in your spacious suite as you admire the elegant European- and Moroccan-influenced décor throughout the hotel, before switching into explorer mode to witness the achingly beautiful landscapes and scenery that frame the property. Soak up the freshest of ocean breezes as you stroll along the beaches of New Zealand's stunning West Coast or reconnect with nature on a hike through Egmont National Park. At the end of each day, your comfortable suite and the hotel's nine onsite food and drinks outlets will be waiting for you.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Daily NZ$30 breakfast credit per person to use at Monica’s Eatery
- Welcome drink for two on arrival (glass of wine, bubbles, beer or soft drink each)
- Leisurely 1pm late checkout

**Upgrades available:** Elevate your stay with an upgrade to a Premium or Feature Suite and enjoy views over the city or sea from your very own private balcony. Upgrades will also receive a bottle of wine and a cheese platter in place of a welcome drink.

**This deal has NO surcharges:** Travel any time for the same great price.
offer_address: 41 Queen Street New Plymouth, Taranaki 4312 New Zealand

title: New Plymouth North Island Seaside Escape
description:
Take a breath of fresh sea air in the charming city of New Plymouth when you stay at the boutique King & Queen Hotel Suites, currently rated the #1 hotel in New Plymouth by Tripadvisor. This contemporary hotel boasts cutting-edge architectural design blended with sleek European-inspired interiors, an onsite wine bar and multiple restaurants in the surrounding West End Precinct.

Listen for the sounds of crashing waves and catch sparkling sea views on this West Coast stay, with the best city sights nearby. Just a five-minute walk from the hotel you'll find the Centre City Shopping Centre and Puke Ariki, a combined museum and library. Wander a little further and you'll reach the start of the New Plymouth Coastal Walk, an award-winning almost 13-kilometre seaside promenade. A short five-minute drive from the property is one of Taranaki's most popular beaches, Fitzroy Beach, while the dramatic Mount Taranaki, which featured in the Hollywood blockbuster The Last Samurai, is less than a one-hour drive away.
offer_address: 41 Queen Street New Plymouth, Taranaki 4312 New Zealand

title: North Island: Centrally Located New Plymouth Seaside Escape with Onsite Wine Bar
description:
Take a breath of fresh sea air in the charming city of New Plymouth when you stay at the boutique King & Queen Hotel Suites. This contemporary property boasts cutting-edge architectural design blended with sleek European-inspired interiors, an onsite wine bar and easy access to the many restaurants in the surrounding West End Precinct.

Listen for the sounds of crashing waves and catch sparkling sea views on this West Coast stay, with the best city sights nearby. Just a five-minute walk from the hotel, you'll find the Centre City Shopping Centre, while one of Taranaki's most popular beaches, Fitzroy Beach, is a five-minute drive away. The stunning Mount Taranaki, which featured in the Hollywood blockbuster The Last Samurai, provides a dramatic backdrop and is less than a one-hour drive away.
offer_address: 41 Queen Street New Plymouth, Taranaki 4312 New Zealand
